system.description:
Your tactical excellence and performative skill weave together into an ever more unified whole, attracting others to yourbanner and inspiring those who follow you to strike down your foes with greater vigor. You gain the following benefits:

  • You gain a single Seasoned follower of your choice.
  • When a creature under the effect of vour Mark Foe feature is reduced to 0 hit points, you regain a use of bardic inspiration.
  • When a creature attacks a targetyou have designated with Mark Foe and misses, you can use your reaction to spend a use of your Bardic Inspiration. The attacking creature gains a Bardic Inspiration die and may spend it immediately, potentially turning the miss into a hit.
  • You learn the thaumaturgy cantrip, which counts as a bard spell for you. When using it to make your voice boom louder than normal, youmay choose to cast it as a bonus action instead of an action.
